c:capability.name: SoilMoisture
c:capability.c:description: Model of water content within soil.

c:attribute.name: watercontent
c:attribute.description: Reflects the ratio of volume of water per volume of soil (0.0 = No Moisture, 0.5 = Completely Saturated).

c:attribute.name: soiltype
c:attribute.description: Reflects the type of soil in which the water content is being measured. Defaults to NORMAL.

c:attribute.name: watercontentupdated
c:attribute.description: UTC date time of when Water Content value was reported by sensor.
